page.title: 15Newland's South Farm
page.content:
Newlands South Farm has got 240 acres altogether. 80 acres of crops and 20 acres of woodland with deciduous and coniferous. 140 acres-grass 25 acres-winter wheat 40 acres-winter barley 10 acres-spring barley 5 acres-potatoes/turnips etc
Crops are never in the same field each year except {barley.}When the crops move its called "{rotation of crops". They do this because some crops take out the nitrogen out of the soil so they plant a different crop in next year so it can restore the things that the other plants take out. Newlands has 3 different kinds of cattle are Fresian, Cross, Hereford and Charolais. The farm machinery includes 3 tractors and other farm implements.
